column1: ID Column, This is a file in csv format from Siemens Balance Sheet. This file is, going to be, prepared firstly, for SQL loading, and then to, upload to Github., ,,
column22: To do so, here we use this formula: =SUMPRODUCT(LEN(A1:T1)-LEN(SUBSTITUTE(A1:T1;",";"")))
